item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 20, 2025 at 3:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. DDoSecrets publishes 410 GB of heap dumps, hacked from TeleMessage (159 points | 27 comments)
2. The Windows Subsystem for Linux is now open source (1116 points | 724 comments)
3. Have I Been Pwned 2.0 (351 points | 121 comments)
4. A shower thought turned into a Collatz visualization (45 points | 1 comment)
5. Jules: An Asynchronous Coding Agent (216 points | 100 comments)
6. What are people doing? Live-ish estimates based on global population dynamics (20 points | 4 comments)
7. Zod 4 (600 points | 181 comments)
8. GitHub Copilot Coding Agent (350 points | 207 comments)
9. Claude Code SDK (278 points | 125 comments)
10. Is-even-ai – Check if a number is even using the power of AI (165 points | 71 comments)
11. Launch HN: Better Auth (YC X25) – Authentication Framework for TypeScript (181 points | 67 comments)
12. Kilo: A text editor in less than 1000 LOC with syntax highlight and search (76 points | 9 comments)
13. Terraform MCP Server (34 points | 5 comments)
14. Run GitHub Actions locally (175 points | 70 comments)
15. Game theory illustrated by an animated cartoon game (220 points | 37 comments)
16. The forbidden railway: Vienna-Pyongyang (2008) (144 points | 39 comments)
17. Remarks on AI from NZ (131 points | 69 comments)
18. xAI's Grok 3 comes to Microsoft Azure (95 points | 90 comments)
19. Too Much Go Misdirection (154 points | 70 comments)
20. I let lasers power my smart home – and I don't want to go back (20 points | 9 comments)
21. Patience too cheap to meter (13 points | 6 comments)
22. WireGuard vanity keygen (52 points | 7 comments)
23. Self-Hosting Moose with Docker Compose, Redis, Temporal, Redpanda and ClickHouse (25 points | 8 comments)
24. ClawPDF – Open-Source Virtual/Network PDF Printer with OCR and Image Support (177 points | 23 comments)
25. Glasskube (YC S24) is hiring in Vienna to build Open Source deployment tools ( | hide)
26. Microbes in Gowanus teach lessons on fighting industrial pollution (12 points | discuss)
27. Dilbert creator Scott Adams says he will die soon from same cancer as Joe Biden (284 points | 321 comments)
28. The truth behind the accuracy of weather forecasts (41 points | 27 comments)
29. Ask HN: When will managers be replaced by AI? (5 points | discuss)
30. Memory Consistency Models: A Tutorial (5 points | discuss)
